Reviews.Title: “Dont go there !”
Reviews.Author: amin1371
Reviews.Content: If you want to have a nice trip i really recommend you not to go there ! The hote has 4 stars but the value is 2 stars !

Reviews.Title: “not recommended at all”
Reviews.Author: mandan m
Reviews.Content: We stayed 4 night there with a 14 month baby ,it was awful.I have been worried about my baby becouse everywhere seems dirty. The room was small and no palce for my baby to walk.I was not sastisfied with breakfast ,all the dishes were without warmer so the food were cold and not tasty at all.I never go back again

Reviews.Title: “Ruz J”
Reviews.Author: Ruzanna J
Reviews.Content: I liked the service at the Kervansaray hotel in general. The most splendid was the restaurant with very rich menu, it tasted like home made food :) Besides, I'd mention receptionists being very helpful on every single case. I'd like to thank the whole staff of the hotel, thank you for excellent reception! I wish to come to Istanbul and stay at Kervansaray Hotel sometime again :)

Reviews.Title: “Compliance, location, prices and the service.”
Reviews.Author: Gagik S S
Reviews.Content: On my opinion Hotel Kervansaray matches 4 star hotel standards. The location is very good and comfortable. Accommodation prices are acceptable. In hotel and restaurant I received very good service. The dishes in the menu in the restaurant are always fresh and tasty. The stuff is always ready to support you. In Kervansaray hotel I really enjoyed home comfort. It's also good for business trips as provides all necessary services for business purposes.

Reviews.Title: “Worth while stay”
Reviews.Author: McKinnn
Reviews.Content: Really good location, very friendly staff, good and varied breakfast. Bathrooms OK. Internet filter a bit problematic.

Reviews.Title: “Acceptable standard with good location”
Reviews.Author: Gul75
Reviews.Content: We have chosen this hotel due to its close proximity to Taksim Square and Istiklal Street. It was also quite easy to go Sultan Ahmet Square by using tram and metro. The staff at the reception desk was very helpful and one of the receptionist knows arabic well. The breakfast has enough variety of food items including freshly prepared cheese rolls that our 6 years old child liked. Room was small but it was clean and beds were comfortable. It is not a luxury hotel but for the money we paid, we got what we have expected.

Reviews.Title: “It's better if you find a barn to sleep over...”
Reviews.Author: mendjanbranko
Reviews.Content: Yes, it's on good location, but it's really awful! Food is terrible, rooms are so dirty (bunch of pubic hairs were on "clean" sheets) bathroom is from 16th century with so much filth and stuff... Really disappointing... And beware of the strange looking men, asking you about the time, they are around the hotel, and they just want you to meet their lovely girls...

Reviews.Title: “Not impressed”
Reviews.Author: SidneyBernstiene
Reviews.Content: We picked this hotel for location and gut feeling from the website. On arrival it is as expected, great location from Taxim Square, smart front and lobby and staff friendly enough. Rooms however not up to this standard. WÄ±th lack of general maintenence, we got over this but the bathroom was in a discusting state. Black mildew in all corners. We changed rooms but the next was the same. ThÄ±s is the fÄ±rst revÄ±ew i have ever made, so Ä±'m not one of those people, just dÄ±dn't want others to fall for the place as we did. We had friends with us and one had a bed with a sprÄ±ng stÄ±ckÄ±ng out of the matress. We requested it to be changed but it never was. Be aware!!

Reviews.Title: “Waste of money”
Reviews.Author: lorem13
Reviews.Content: ok the hotel class mentioned in our travel agency leaflet said it was 4 star hotel , this is fake the hotel is from 2 to 3 stars maximum, The Lobby seems ok when you first enter when you reach the rooms you are starting to realize that this hotel is by no mean a 4 star ,you enter the rooms and a smell hits your nose ,the carpet is dirty the bathroom says the same story.If you pay something more you will have a view of the sea but from that side the noise from A/C is too loud making it difficult to sleep.And then the problems with the stuff ,it is unacceptable in a hotel not to speak English.I payed the coffee in the lobby 8TL that is 4E and the coffee was from a instant machine ,the guys there seem friendly but all they want is to take your money.there is no professionalism.The WI Fi is free but I stayed on 501 room and only I could get was the signal from other hotels ,after some experimentation I got signal near the door of the room at a corner with 1Mb/s speed ,again unacceptable for 2010 Istanbul and finally be carefull what they charge you,last day when I was ready to leave I had taken 2 coffees and 1 water from the minibar which they charge for 8TL and 3TL which I found afterwards.Upon leaving the guy in reception said I owed 33TL I was about to pay when I thought wtf why that much and he wrote on a paper 2*4 and 4*4 ,I told him he made a mistake and after 4 days in instanbul (everyone wants to "steal" you) I got upset and told him I would nt pay anything more than 20 TL ,after some moments of gestures and me shouting I told him to get the manager then he came and told me that the other guy did a mistake and it was only 2 waters and each water costed 4TL,at that point I was ready to call the police ,he took with attitute the 20TL printed a receipt that showed that water costed 3TL instead of 4TL....all in all they made my day...You may thing that it is good value for money but it is not ///DO not go there there are plenty other hotels much better in the same road and with same price ..

Reviews.Title: “Not impressive”
Reviews.Author: ilovesfwater
Reviews.Content: There are an abundance of nice hotels in the modern side of Istanbul and this is not one of them. Though it boast a 4 star rating, it rates closer to a 3. Upon arriving, the room barely had enough walking space for two people. It also smelled like smoke for most of the time. The worst part was entering our room after a long day out an having it smell like the sewer. It happened to be raining in Istanbul...I guess the sewage situation was not quite up to par...

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Hotel, Beautiful Sea Views from room”
Reviews.Author: MrsKHampshire
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed her for the first 2 weeks of July, we arrived early hours of the morning and was greeted by freidnly reception staff and our bags taken to our room. We stayed in the main hotel with sea views, after talking to a few people we met out there would reccomend this option as you are near to all the facilities as some of the bungalow rooms can be quite a walk. The beach is just a platform with steps into the sea, but still nice with the All Inclusive bar down there as well, nice and breezy. The snack bar offers a small selection every day but food was very nice. The main restuarant varies each day, but if you do go near closing time some items can run out. They always have the grill with the chef cooking somthing fresh and always plenty to choose from, Salads galore and a diet buffet (which did not look very appetizing and never tried it) But as a whole there was always something to eat. The entertainment is very the same and there is no bar by the theatre. We had a lovely relaxing holiday which is what we wanted and the decor of the hotel was nice and always clean. And the sea views from the hotel room were beautiful. The only downside is there is nothing within walking distance, but as we wanted was to sit in a sunlounger for 2 weeks and relax then this is ideal, as you have facilities on site like 3 pools, a spa daytime and evening entertainment.

Reviews.Title: “couldnt ask for any more exactly what u pay for”
Reviews.Author: icemaidenPortsmouth
Reviews.Content: read some duff reviews on some hotels in turkey but having read some good ones on this hotel decided to bite the bullet and book definately the best thing we did. the hotel is in some need of refurbishment but on the whole basic but clean, the staff are always pleasant (especially if ur a woman!!) the best thing of all is the food always a worry if ur all inc. the location is good if u want to be near the centre of marmaris or the beach but not in the heart of it because of the noise, the dolmus and taxis's r right outside the hotel costs average 50p to get to the beach. dont always believe the holiday reps bout trips etc round the pool r some guys sellin trips for half the price of thomas cook reps we went on a couple n they were fantastic esp the boat trips thom cook wanted Â£50 per couple pool guy Â£50 for 6 people couldnt fault it at all, if we were to go back to turkey i would stay at this hotel again and again whoever slates it needs to chill out too many people read these reviews and panic bout what to do u cant go wrong with this place i would recommend it to all i speak to, the only thing i could diss about the place was the size of the drinks from the bar small plastic cup size they need to give bigger glasses which would mean less queues at the bar apart from that happy holidays :)

Reviews.Title: “good holiday apart from”
Reviews.Author: nyreesen
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Kervansary hotel for ten nights, as it was the first time we had taken our four year old daughter on a plane and a foreign holiday i had concerns so we booked ten nights. The hotel is clean and quite modern lots of glass, very very noisy during heavy rain! Reception staff were efficient and helpful. Bar staff we a bit abrupt but as the holiday went on they warmed. Lets face it standing there for the hours they do for the pay they get wouldn't make me smile too much! Entertainment staff very friendly great with the kids, we took a 4 year old girl a 10 year old boy and a 14 year old boy. They all enjoyed the water slides including myself and my husband who was like a big kid, i apologise to anyone sat by the slides for the tidal waves he sent over them. MC one of the entertainers (cant remember the others names) Made a lot of effort to play games with everyone, i must say some days the music was a bit loud! Last but definately not least....... THE FOOD! We were all inclusive as we thought that would be easier with 3 kids, ice creams and drinks can cost a fortune. We ended up eating out quite alot. There was ice cream and cand floss also toffee apples but they were not included and the price could change at any time! There was early tea for kids at 7pm ( not 6.55pm, 7 on the dot!) it consisted of cold chips and chicken , the chicken on the bone was nice but the cold rubbery nuggets left alot to be desired. The rest of the food available was pretty awful, the staff were rude and unhelpful and watched your every move which was very uncomfortable. If you like your cuppa then this was available breakfast only but coffee all day which was unfair. Take your PG tips! If you have booked to go here take extra money incase you find the food as we did.Go to the Serenity Bar a few 100 metres down the road, staff great food fantastic great with kids. Say hello to Ali,Glen, Debbie, Albert and Jacob.

Reviews.Title: “try to stay away”
Reviews.Author: offwego4
Reviews.Content: The first room I got was just filthy and broken. The 2nd one was better but still many broken staff. The location is great, the staff is nice, breakfast is good, and the free internet is realy working nicely. But the bottomline - this is not a 4 star hotel, the 3 start hotel I was staing in Bejing a month ago was like 4 stars above this one.

Reviews.Title: “Bargain in Taksim”
Reviews.Author: femalenomad68
Reviews.Content: When I arrived at Hotel Kervansaray near Taksim Square in the newer part of the city, I was distressed to learn that my travel agent had not actually gotten reservations for this hotel. Fortunately, the young lady at the desk spoke excellent English. She made a few phone calls and we got the situation resolved. So our party of 5 stayed at this hotel. As soon as we got to our rooms, a plate of fruit arrived. Turkish friends were meeting us at the hotel, and they were very pleased about the location of the hotel. This hotel is small and quiet. The staff does its best to be helpful. I am planning to stay here when I return to Istanbul in the spring.

Reviews.Title: “Clean friendly hotel”
Reviews.Author: Shirley21
Reviews.Content: Just returned from an enjoyable stay. Very clean, bed changed daily. Fair sized rooms. Plenty of choice for breakfast. We stayed 5 nights and never tried all that was offered. No problem using the pool at the other hotels. Staff could not be more helpful or kind. Would stay again if in Taksim as very secure area as all cars were monitored in and out. Able to walk alone as a woman and not feel threatened. Nice little resturant call The Natural something oposite about 30 yards up. I was worried when I read the other review but can honestly say there were no smells during our stay.

HotelInfo.Name: Kervansaray Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Sehit Muhtar Cad.No:49, Istanbul 80090, Turkey
